interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: The Detangler Brush - Detangling Brush/Comb - No More Pain - The"No More Tangle" Hairbrush for Women, Girls, Kids - Control & Detangle 99% of All Hair Types - 100% Guarantee [Petite Size] Review Date: 2015/08/26 Store: The Detangler Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'The Detangler', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Package Dimensions': '3.7 x 2.9 x 1.9 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '794168074750 619159393255'} Review Text: This is my very long hair's best friend! I have no explanation, nor will I attempt to explain how the design and dynamics of this nifty tool works. One thing I can say is that it detangles my waist length hair like nothing else! Using ordinary combs can be extremely challenging for women with long hair like myself. I experienced a lot less instances of hair fall, because this detangling brush separates the knots and tangled bits of my hair more efficiently. A "must have tool" for women, regardless of how long or short their hair is!

As a blogger, I am often provided Press Sample kits by companies for review purposes. Regardless, I only recommend products or services I use personally and believe will be good for others. I refuse to review or endorse products that I have not or will not personally try. Needless to say, I may be a product reviewer but my thoughts are real and none of the things I say on my reviews are made up or fake - they are all based on my experience/s with whatever product I am reviewing. I’m just a regular consumer and I appreciate reading and giving honest feedback about products that regular people like me use on a daily basis or consider buying. My views and opinions are from a customer/end user’s standpoint. Review Title: This is my very long hair's best friend! I have no explanation Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
La Deessa Powerful 20% Vitamin C Serum For Face +11% Hyaluronic, Organic Anti Aging Skin Care. Hydrate, Moisturize, Increase Collagen, Reduce Fine Lines, Hyper pigmentation & Acne. La Deessa ['La Deessa products are the answer to compromised skin structure & integrity. With the utmost respect for our eco system, La Deessa sustainably combines Natural, Organic, Plant Based and Wild Crafted Botanicals with clinically proven & independently peer reviewed superstar natural and organic age-defying ingredients with highly effective delivery systems to create results-driven anti aging skin care products. KEY INGREDIENT HIGHLIGHTS: ALOE VERA increases your body’s production of collagen and is packed with essential vitamins including A, B1, B2, B6, B12, C & E. Aloe penetrates skin four-times (4x) more rapidly than water and accelerates skin cell reproduction by as much as eight-times (8x)! VITAMIN C supports every aspect of collagen production from stem cell activity to improving the structural integrity, resilience and stability of the skin. Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate is an extremely stable and gentle Vitamin C derivative and a precursor to Vitamin C; it waits to convert into Ascorbic Acid until it is fully absorbed, at which time the sodium molecules separate, converting it into pure Vitamin C deep within your skin...this prevents irritation and amplifies antioxidant benefits, making Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate a superior form of Vitamin C in cosmetic formulations. HYALURONIC ACID has the unique ability to hold more than 1000 times its weight in water, allowing the skin to retain more water. Amazingly, hyaluronic acid adjusts its moisture absorption to your skin’s need for moisture making it ideal for all skin types. Hyaluronic acid also protects the epidermis by scavenging reactive oxygen species generated by ultra violet light. Our formulations contain high percentages of Hyaluronic Acid. MSM- METHYL SULPHONYL MTHANE (ORGANIC SULFUR) Dubbed the “Beauty Mineral” Organic sulfur is referred to as the “Beauty Mineral” because it promotes oxygen transport across cell membranes (intracellular) facilitating cellular regeneration…resulting in skin that is more beautiful.'] {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Fragrance Free', 'Brand': 'La Deessa', 'Item Form': 'liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Gluten Free, Natural, Vegan', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 2 x 2 inches; 3 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LD-VITAC20', 'UPC': '040232150944', 'Manufacturer': 'La Deessa'} I have very dry and sensitive skin and read so many good things about Vitamin C Serum. This particular brand has been working very good for me - I have been using it at night and I have been loving it so far!

Please do check my in depth blog review on this product: http://wp.me/p1u6bQ-fB

Yalmeh Naturals Eye Bright Gel Yalmeh Peerless Beauty ["Yalmeh Glory Eye Bright Gel ranks as a superior Anti Aging product for all your skin. It is extremely effective at eliminating dark circles and wrinkles. It is also efficient for puffiness and loss of tone. SAFE, ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTS- Yalmeh Glory Eye Bright Gel contains all natural ingredients, no toxic chemicals or cancer causing additives - no mineral oil, sulfates or alcohol ,propylene glycol or paraben. We do not test our products on animals NEVER-EVER. This is the BEST EYE GEL and is an effective natural solution for all types of skin. And, it lasts forever - a little goes a long way. And what matters most, however, is that the Yalmeh Glory Eye Gel works incredibly well. You will feel better both inside and out. THIS EYE GEL is 100% natural & 75% organic Click the 'Add to Cart' button at the top of this page NOW - Your Eyes Will Thank You."] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.4 x 0.4 x 0.4 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GEBG-Y005', 'UPC': '640671981439 885612923240', 'Manufacturer': 'SETAF'} I have tried other Yalmeh products in the past and have been very happy with the results that I got. Needless to say, I had high hopes when I started using this eye gel. I was and still am very impressed with how well it works for my sensitive undereye area, as it really reduces the puffiness under my eyes that I am perpetually plagued with, when I wake up in the morning. It is also working so well as far as hydrating my eye area goes! This product and brand always delivers the results that I am hoping to get from skin care products. Love this brand and product!

Your skin will “snap back” when pulled, giving you the elasticity you had when you were much, much younger.', 'Absolutely NO fillers, NO binders, NO artificial ingredients and GLUTEN-FREE', 'ARE YOU EXCITED TO:', '-Instantly reverse signs of aging -Vanish fine lines and wrinkles -Reduce the appearance of age spots -Get rid of bags under your eyes -Firm and lift facial skin', 'Click the', 'ADD TO CART', 'button now to get this Skin Care Miracle in a Bottle!', 'NOTE: This product is specifically designed for men and women that NEED TO LOSE MORE THAN 10 YEARS OFF OF THEIR APPEARANCE'] {'Skin Type': 'All, Oily, Combination, Normal', 'Use for': 'Neck, Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 2.8 x 2.1 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Skin_Care_Bundle'} Vitamin C Serum and Phytoceramides - my favorite skin combo! I don't think I'll ever give this combo up, as it has truly helped with my issues regarding skin dryness. It's well priced and most importantly, it delivers the results that it guarantees to give. This winter has been tremendously harsh on my skin and I don't know what I would have done, without these products. Go check it out - it's worth all the hype!

I am very happy that I was given a chance to try Luxy ... 2.5% Retinol Cream with Hyaluronic Acid Serum - 97% Natural Key West Health & Beauty {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.5 x 6 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '799666510588', 'Manufacturer': 'USA'} Retinol is one of the things that I look for when purchasing night time creams, as I am in my mid thirties and require a little help with the fine lines that I am starting to notice. I don't have a lot but the ones I have are enough to get me very concerned about what skin care products to use. One other thing that I am concerned about is my sensitive skin. I love the Retinol Night Cream by Key West Health and Beauty because it addresses all my concern: help with moisture retention on my face, eradicating what fine lines I have on my face and a formula that will work with my extra sensitive skin. So far, I am really loving this product!

I started using this stretch mark cream on my thigh area - where I really need help and I need this cream to work. Using this product and losing the stretch marks has given me more confidence! Summer is fast approaching and I won't be as self conscious when trying out new swimsuit styles. Thank you, Jaylie!

OZNaturals Facial Sunscreen This Anti Aging SPF 30, Broad Spectrum, Mineral Sunscreen with Zinc Oxide Will Help You Keep That Healthy Youthful Glow! OZ Naturals ['Skin care experts and dermatologists are in agreement on the importance of wearing a facial sunscreen. \xa0Most premature aging of the skin is caused by sun exposure. “Photo aging,” as is it known in skin care circles, includes wrinkles, freckles, age spots, blotchy complexion, dullness, sagging skin and rough, leathery texture. In other words, just about every complaint surrounding aging skin can be traced at least in part to sun exposure, making daily sunscreen protection with an SPF 30 sunscreen a must. But not all sunscreens are created equal. \xa0OZNaturals Age Defying Solar Shield SPF 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen with Zinc Oxide provides broad spectrum protection from the sun’s harmful UVA/UVB rays, while moisturizing skin. As a zinc sunscreen, it utilizes the highly stable and reflective properties of Zinc Oxide, along with the natural UV diluting qualities of Octyl Methoxycinnamate. This natural sunscreen offers sheer, broad-spectrum UV coverage in a moisturizing formulation.'] {'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Product Benefits': 'Anti-Aging', 'Sun Protection': '30 SPF', 'Item Weight': '0.12 Pounds', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.5 x 3.5 x 1.5 inches; 1.92 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2Y-BD27-UJFL', 'UPC': '638317780645', 'Manufacturer': 'OZ Naturals, LLC'} It is very hard to find an Anti Aging Sunscreen that works for my sensitive and perpetually dry skin - the struggle is real! Needless to say, I didn't really know what to expect when I got this sunscreen in the mail. However, I have used quite a few of OZ Natural's products and have never been disappointed with/by any of them! This sunscreen works very well with my extremely sensitive skin! I never got rashes, bumps, hives. redness and/or swelling, when I used this product. Also, I kid you not when I say that it works beautifully under makeup! Some of the sunscreen products that I have used in the past, altered the color and consistency of any foundation I use. Not this one from OZ Naturals! I seriously love this product!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Concerns:** Focuses on dry, sensitive skin with a strong need for hydration, anti-aging properties, and sun protection. Interested in products that deliver visible results and address various signs of aging.

- **Product Preferences:** Champions organic, natural, and eco-friendly skincare, prioritizing intensive hydration and effective ingredients, such as Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid. Values 100% natural, cruelty-free formulations free from harsh chemicals, while also seeking products with sun protection.

- **Usage Behavior:** Dedicates herself to applying serums, treatments, and sunscreen as part of her night and daily skincare routines. Open to exploring new products that cater to her sensitive skin needs.

- **Research-Oriented:** Engages deeply with product information and values genuine customer reviews before making purchases. Her commitment to authentic recommendations is emphasized by her personal experiences with successful products.

- **Honest Feedback:** Offers clear and straightforward feedback, reflecting her integrity as a product reviewer. Shares real experiences to inform others, strengthening her community.

- **Brand Values:** Attracted to brands emphasizing sustainability, holistic skin health, and cruelty-free practices. Actively seeks products aligned with her ethical values, prioritizing effectiveness and user-friendly design.

- **Broadening Interests:** Recently expanded her interests to include hair care tools, emphasizing the importance of efficiency and care in her beauty routine. She remains committed to providing honest, consumer-oriented insights based on her experiences with various products.
